  17. (************************** Trap barrier *******************************)

  19. open Debugcom
  20. open Checkpoints

  22. ‌let current_trap_barrier = ref Sp.null

  24. ‌let install_trap_barrier pos =
  25.   current_trap_barrier := pos

  27. ‌let remove_trap_barrier () =
  28.   current_trap_barrier := Sp.null

  30. (* Ensure the trap barrier state is up to date in current checkpoint. *)
  31. ‌let update_trap_barrier () =
  32.   if !current_checkpoint.c_trap_barrier <> !current_trap_barrier then
  33.     Exec.protect
  34.       (function () ->
  35.          set_trap_barrier !current_trap_barrier;
  36.          !current_checkpoint.c_trap_barrier <- !current_trap_barrier)

  38. (* Execute `funct' with a trap barrier. *)
  39. (* --- Used by `finish'. *)
  40. let exec_with_trap_barrier trap_barrier funct =
  41.   install_trap_barrier trap_barrier;
  42.   Fun.protect ~finally:remove_trap_barrier funct
